info.name: Airlines
info.description: This collection helps to see different scenarios for creating, obtaining, updating and deleting airlines in the API.

request.description: This request creates a new airline. The API returns the created resource with the assigned ID.

response.name: Add an airline
response.body:
{
    "name": "Wingo",
    "description": "Nuestras tarifas bajas y red de rutas son la combinación perfecta que te escapes a los lugares que siempre has querido conocer. Además, en Wingo, creemos en la libertad y por eso, con nosotros personalizas tu experiencia de viaje a la medida de tus gustos, necesidades y presupuesto. Así, solo pagas por lo que realmente quieres.",
    "foundeddate": "2016-10-19",
    "webpage": "https://www.wingo.com/",
    "id": "3a903788-26be-471b-969e-9b7daac7f46b"
}

request.description: This request returns all created airlines in the form of an array with all relevant information of the airlines, including their associated airports.

response.name: Get all airlines

request.description: This requests returns an specific airline that exists, with all relevant data including its associated airports.

response.name: Get an airline
response.body:
{
    "id": "3dddd04b-d3c8-4783-b4c3-7d99db02a244",
    "name": "Wingo",
    "description": "Nuestras tarifas bajas y red de rutas son la combinación perfecta que te escapes a los lugares que siempre has querido conocer. Además, en Wingo, creemos en la libertad y por eso, con nosotros personalizas tu experiencia de viaje a la medida de tus gustos, necesidades y presupuesto. Así, solo pagas por lo que realmente quieres.",
    "foundeddate": "2016-10-19T05:00:00.000Z",
    "webpage": "https://www.wingo.com/",
    "airports": []
}

exec: pm.expect(data.message).to.eql("The airline with the given id was not found");

request.description: This request return a 404 Not Found error when trying to get an specific airline that does not exist.

response.name: Get an invalid airline

request.description: This request updates the information of an existing airline, and it returns the affected airline with its updated fields.

response.name: Update an airline
response.body:
{
    "id": "743ee14b-5c6d-45c7-9ce0-ee65f0dcf645",
    "name": "Wingo",
    "description": "Nuestras tarifas bajas y red de rutas son la combinación perfecta que te escapes a los lugares que siempre has querido conocer. Además, en Wingo, creemos en la libertad y por eso, con nosotros personalizas tu experiencia de viaje a la medida de tus gustos, necesidades y presupuesto. Así, solo pagas por lo que realmente quieres.",
    "foundeddate": "2016-10-19",
    "webpage": "https://www.wingo.com/acerca-de-nosotros"
}

exec: pm.expect(data.message).to.eql("The airline with the given id was not found");

request.description: This request returns a 404 Not Found error when trying to update an airline that does not exist.

response.name: Update an invalid airline

request.description: This request deletes an existing airline, and returns only a HTTP 204 code.

exec: pm.expect(data.message).to.eql("The airline with the given id was not found");

request.description: This request returns an 404 Not Found error when trying to delete an airline that does not exist.

response.name: Delete an invalid airline
